ygData.subject: Re: Which spells to use?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Pretty much all spells have their uses, notable exceptions: sense magic, and identify (though they are nice for raising your divination skill) ... All
ygData.messageBody:
Patrick Pichette wrote:
>
> From: "Patrick Pichette" <poptart77@...>
>
> I'm new to the list and was wondering if any of you could offer me some
> insight on which spells to get at certain levels or which ones to avoid

Pretty much all spells have their uses, notable exceptions: sense magic,
and identify (though they are nice for raising your divination skill)

> (useless spells). Is there also a list devoted to tracking down where all
> spells are located?
All spells except the following are available from all enchanter
vendors: level 8+ animations, enchant metal spells, certain spells above
level 16, as these are research only (some are available from other
guilds (levite, disempower,etc..)
>
> Final question: Shallow breath seems to be a spell that we begin with.. why
> is it for sale by merchants? And does it do Damage Over Time or is it a one
> time damage of 4 points or so..?
>
It is a DoT
> Thanks,
>
> Azkraqer
> 2nd Season Enchanter
